LOCAL.TYPES:
` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature *CLASS zaplink_extractor DEFINITION LOAD. CLASS lcl_data DEFINITION DEFERRED. CLASS zaplink_synchronizer DEFINITION LOCAL FRIENDS lcl_data. *----------------------------------------------------------------------* * CLASS lcl_data DEFINITIO *----------------------------------------------------------------------* * *----------------------------------------------------------------------* CLASS lcl_data DEFINITION CREATE PUBLIC FRIENDS zaplink_synchronizer .
PUBLIC SECTION. INTERFACES zaplink_datatypes. ALIASES td_filename FOR zaplink_datatypes~td_filename. ALIASES td_checksum FOR zaplink_datatypes~td_checksum. ALIASES to_xml FOR zaplink_datatypes~to_xml. ALIASES td_comptype FOR zaplink_datatypes~td_comptype. ALIASES td_compname FOR zaplink_datatypes~td_compname. ALIASES td_devclass FOR zaplink_datatypes~td_devclass.
INTERFACES zaplink_kernel_types. ALIASES to_file FOR zaplink_kernel_types~to_file. ALIASES to_raw FOR zaplink_kernel_types~to_raw. ALIASES to_raw_base FOR zaplink_kernel_types~to_raw_base.
TYPES ts_key TYPE zaplink_directory=>ts_key. TYPES ts_data TYPE zaplink_directory=>ts_data.
DATA type TYPE td_comptype. DATA name TYPE td_compname. DATA package TYPE td_devclass. DATA o_raw TYPE to_raw. DATA o_file TYPE to_file. DATA o_raw_base TYPE to_raw_base. DATA filename TYPE td_filename. DATA checksum TYPE td_checksum. DATA signature TYPE td_checksum. DATA o_xml TYPE to_xml. METHODS join IMPORTING value(data) TYPE REF TO lcl_data. METHODS get_key RETURNING value(result) TYPE ts_key. METHODS get_file_data RETURNING value(result) TYPE ts_data. METHODS get_sap_data RETURNING value(result) TYPE ts_data. PROTECTED SECTION. PRIVATE SECTION. ENDCLASS. "lcl_data DEFINITIO
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes CLASS lcl_data IMPLEMENTATION. METHOD join. DEFINE lmac_join. if me->&1 is initial. me->&1 = data->&1. endif. END-OF-DEFINITION. lmac_join: o_xml, o_raw_base, o_raw, filename, checksum, type, name, package, checksum, signature. ENDMETHOD. "Join METHOD get_key. result-type = type. result-name = name. ENDMETHOD. "get_key METHOD get_file_data. DATA xml_str TYPE string. CHECK o_raw_base IS BOUND. result-checksum = o_raw_base->get_checksum( ). result-signature = o_raw_base->get_code_signature( ). IF o_file IS BOUND. xml_str = o_file->get_filecontent( ). ELSE. xml_str = zaplink_connectors=>raw_2_string( o_raw_base ). ENDIF. result-content = zaplink_tools=>zip_string( xml_str ). ENDMETHOD. "get_file_data METHOD get_sap_data. DATA xml_str TYPE string. CHECK o_raw IS BOUND. result-checksum = o_raw->get_checksum( ). result-signature = o_raw->get_code_signature( ). xml_str = zaplink_connectors=>raw_2_string( o_raw ). result-content = zaplink_tools=>zip_string( xml_str ). ENDMETHOD. "get_sap_data ENDCLASS. "lcl_data IMPLEMENTATION
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class DEFINE lmac_create_data. create object &1. &1->o_file = &2-o_file. &1->o_xml = &2-o_xml. &1->o_raw_base = &2-o_raw_base. &1->o_raw = &2-o_raw. &1->filename = &2-filename. * &1->checksum = &2-checksum. if &2-o_raw_base is bound. &1->type = &2-o_raw_base->get_type( ). &1->name = &2-o_raw_base->get_name( ). &1->package = &2-o_raw_base->directory-devclass. &1->checksum = &2-o_raw_base->get_checksum( ). &1->signature = &2-o_raw_base->get_code_signature( ). elseif &2-o_raw is bound. &1->type = &2-o_raw->get_type( ). &1->name = &2-o_raw->get_name( ). &1->package = &2-o_raw->directory-devclass. &1->checksum = &2-o_raw->get_checksum( ). &1->signature = &2-o_raw->get_code_signature( ). endif. END-OF-DEFINITION.

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA t_filelist TYPE zaplink_file=>tt_file_list. DATA filename TYPE td_filename. DATA t_keys TYPE tt_compkeys. * DATA o_list TYPE to_list. DATA o_comp TYPE to_component. DATA o_comp_n TYPE to_component. DATA o_conn TYPE to_connector. DATA s_my_file TYPE ts_my_file. DATA o_data TYPE to_ldata. DATA _comp TYPE zaplink_component=>ts_component. * DATA d_checksum TYPE td_checksum. * DATA d_code_sign TYPE td_checksum. DATA d_msg TYPE string. DATA o_options TYPE to_options. DATA o_directory TYPE to_opt_directory. DATA s_directory TYPE ts_directory. DATA o_devc TYPE to_opt_devclass. DATA o_tr TYPE to_opt_transport_request.
DATA _cx_cnx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_connector. DATA _cx_comp TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_component. DATA _cx_list TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_list. DATA d_icon TYPE td_light. DATA s_key TYPE ts_key. DATA s_data TYPE ts_fulldata.
* Initialize Interator TRY. working_list->order_kind = zaplink_list=>order_kinds-no_order. working_list->init_iter( ). working_list->display_progress = abap_true. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ).
WHILE o_comp_n IS BOUND. TRY. o_comp = o_comp_n. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ). o_data ?= o_comp->get_add_object( ). CASE o_comp->get_action( ). WHEN actions-import. d_icon = zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-import. WHEN actions-export. d_icon = zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-export. WHEN actions-uninstall. d_icon = zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-uninst. WHEN actions-unreplicable. d_icon = zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-rep_error. WHEN actions-none. d_icon = icon_okay. WHEN OTHERS. ENDCASE. * (&1) &2 : File &3&4 MESSAGE s013 WITH o_data->type o_data->name o_data->filename INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ d_icon AS ICON, d_msg.
s_key = o_data->get_key( ). * File CLEAR: s_data. s_data-signature = s_data-checksum = ` `. s_data-change = o_data->get_file_data( ). MESSAGE s014 WITH 'Fil'(fil) s_data-checksum s_data-signature INTO d_msg. WRITE:/5 icon_default_windows AS ICON, d_msg.
* Directory CLEAR: s_data. s_data-signature = s_data-checksum = ` `. s_data = zaplink_directory=>get_directory( s_key ). MESSAGE s014 WITH 'Dir'(dir) s_data-checksum s_data-signature INTO d_msg. WRITE:/5 icon_read_file AS ICON, d_msg.
* SAP CLEAR: s_data. s_data-signature = s_data-checksum = ` `. s_data-change = o_data->get_sap_data( ). MESSAGE s014 WITH 'SAP'(sap) s_data-checksum s_data-signature INTO d_msg. WRITE:/5 icon_sap AS ICON, d_msg.
WRITE:/.
CATCH zaplink_cx_component INTO _cx_comp. CREATE OBJECT _cx_cnx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_failed prev_cx = _cx_comp. _cx_cnx->update( ). o_comp->set_exception( _cx_cnx ). * Failed to add component '&NAME&' (&TYPE&). Look at exception & message collector in component to get the root cause. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx_container EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_comp_failed type = _comp-type name = _comp-name. ENDTRY. ENDWHILE. CATCH zaplink_cx_list INTO _cx_list. * Failed to components list. Due to exception '&CX_NAME&'. CREATE OBJECT o_mycx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_component=>invalid_exception prev_cx = _cx_list. o_mycx->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_mycx. ENDTRY.

` DATA t_filelist TYPE zaplink_file=>tt_file_list. DATA filename TYPE td_filename. DATA t_keys TYPE tt_compkeys. DATA o_comp TYPE to_component. DATA o_comp_n TYPE to_component. DATA o_conn TYPE to_connector. DATA s_my_file TYPE ts_my_file. DATA o_data TYPE to_ldata. DATA _comp TYPE zaplink_component=>ts_component. DATA d_msg TYPE string. DATA o_options TYPE to_options. DATA o_directory TYPE to_opt_directory. DATA s_directory TYPE ts_directory. DATA o_devc TYPE to_opt_devclass. DATA o_tr TYPE to_opt_transport_request. DATA _cx_cnx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_connector. DATA _cx_comp TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_component. DATA _cx_list TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_list. DATA s_key TYPE ts_key. DATA s_data TYPE ts_fulldata.
analyse( target_dir = target_dir srcsystem = srcsystem type = type name = name packages = packages ext = ext hierarchy = hierarchy author = author ).
working_list->change_selection( ).
IF options IS BOUND. o_options = options. o_directory = o_options->get_directory( ). ELSE. CREATE OBJECT o_options. CREATE OBJECT o_directory. CREATE OBJECT o_devc. CREATE OBJECT o_tr. o_devc->set_substitutionkind( zaplink_opt_devclass=>substitutionkinds-no_overwrite ). o_tr->set_substitutionkind( zaplink_opt_transport_request=>substitutionkinds-user ). ENDIF.
* Initialize Interator TRY. working_list->order_kind = zaplink_list=>order_kinds-no_order. working_list->init_sel_iter( ). working_list->display_progress = abap_true. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ).
WHILE o_comp_n IS BOUND. TRY. o_comp = o_comp_n. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ). o_conn = o_comp->connector( ). CLEAR s_my_file. o_data ?= o_comp->get_add_object( ). s_key = o_data->get_key( ). CASE o_comp->get_action( ). WHEN actions-import. s_directory = o_options->directory->set_directory( o_data->o_raw_base ).
TRY. o_conn->import_to_sap( o_data->o_xml ). * (&1) &2 : Change detected - Imported from file &3 MESSAGE s006 WITH o_data->type o_data->name o_data->filename INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-import AS ICON, zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-green AS ICON, d_msg. CATCH zaplink_cx_connector INTO _cx_cnx. * (&1) &2 : Change detected - Failed to load from file &3 MESSAGE s007 WITH o_data->type o_data->name o_data->filename INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-import AS ICON, zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-red AS ICON, d_msg. ENDTRY.
o_data->checksum = o_data->o_raw_base->get_checksum( ). o_data->signature = o_data->o_raw_base->get_code_signature( ). s_data-change = o_data->get_file_data( ). zaplink_directory=>set_directory( key = s_key data = s_data-change ). WHEN actions-export. filename = create_fullpath( directory = target_dir hierarchy = hierarchy comp = o_comp ). save_file( o_raw = o_data->o_raw filename = filename ). o_data->checksum = o_data->o_raw->get_checksum( ). o_data->signature = o_data->o_raw->get_code_signature( ). s_data-change = o_data->get_sap_data( ). zaplink_directory=>set_directory( key = s_key data = s_data-change ). WHEN actions-uninstall. TRY. o_conn->delete_from_sap( o_comp ). * (&1) &2 : Change detected - Component deleted MESSAGE s008 WITH o_data->type o_data->name INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-uninst AS ICON, zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-green AS ICON, d_msg. zaplink_directory=>del_directory( key = s_key ). CATCH zaplink_cx_connector INTO _cx_cnx. * (&1) &2 : Change detected - Failed to deleted component MESSAGE s009 WITH o_data->type o_data->name INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-uninst AS ICON, zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-red AS ICON, d_msg. ENDTRY. WHEN actions-unreplicable. * (&1) &2 : Replication Error - 3 differents checksums with file &3 MESSAGE s010 WITH o_data->type o_data->name o_data->filename INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-rep_error AS ICON, zaplink_list_4extractor=>lights-yellow AS ICON, d_msg.
IF o_data->o_raw_base IS BOUND. s_my_file-checksum = o_data->o_raw_base->get_checksum( ). ENDIF. s_data = zaplink_directory=>get_directory( s_key ). IF o_data->o_raw IS BOUND. o_data->checksum = o_data->o_raw->get_checksum( ). ELSE. o_data->checksum = 'Not in range'(nir). ENDIF. * Checksums : File (&1), Repository (&2) and SAP (&3) MESSAGE s011 WITH s_my_file-checksum s_data-checksum o_data->checksum INTO d_msg. WRITE:/ space, space, d_msg. WHEN OTHERS. ENDCASE.
CATCH zaplink_cx_connector INTO _cx_cnx. o_comp->set_exception( _cx_cnx ). TRY. o_comp->set_msg_coll( o_conn->application_log ). CATCH cx_root. ENDTRY.
CATCH zaplink_cx_component INTO _cx_comp. CREATE OBJECT _cx_cnx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_failed prev_cx = _cx_comp. _cx_cnx->update( ). o_comp->set_exception( _cx_cnx ). * Failed to add component '&NAME&' (&TYPE&). Look at exception & message collector in component to get the root cause. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx_container EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_comp_failed type = _comp-type name = _comp-name. ENDTRY. ENDWHILE. CATCH zaplink_cx_list INTO _cx_list. * Failed to components list. Due to exception '&CX_NAME&'. CREATE OBJECT o_mycx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_component=>invalid_exception prev_cx = _cx_list. o_mycx->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_mycx. ENDTRY.

` DATA o_file TYPE to_file. DATA t_filelist TYPE zaplink_file=>tt_file_list. DATA d_mask TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename. DATA t_keys TYPE tt_compkeys. DATA o_tmp_list TYPE to_list. DATA o_comp TYPE to_component. DATA o_comp_n TYPE to_component. DATA o_srch_c TYPE to_component. DATA o_conn TYPE to_connector. DATA o_cnx_clean TYPE to_connector_cleaner. DATA s_my_file TYPE ts_my_file. DATA o_raw TYPE REF TO zaplink_raw. DATA o_data TYPE to_ldata. DATA o_data_tmp TYPE to_ldata. DATA _comp TYPE zaplink_component=>ts_component. DATA s_key TYPE ts_key. DATA s_data TYPE ts_fulldata. DATA _cx_cnx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_connector. DATA _cx_comp TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_component. DATA _cx_list TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_list. DATA msg TYPE string. DATA _pos TYPE i. DATA d_t_count TYPE sy-tabix.
FIELD-SYMBOLS: <f> LIKE LINE OF t_filelist.
t_keys = zaplink_tools=>get_keys_from_tadir( srcsystem = srcsystem type = type name = name packages = packages ext = ext author = author ).
TRY. CREATE OBJECT working_list. working_list->add_keys( t_keys ). working_list->select_default( zaplink_list=>sel_actions-export ). working_list->reverse_selection( ). o_tmp_list = working_list->selection_as_list( ). working_list->remove_list( o_tmp_list ).
* Initialize Interator working_list->order_kind = zaplink_list=>order_kinds-no_order. working_list->init_iter( ). working_list->display_progress = abap_true. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ).
WHILE o_comp_n IS BOUND. o_comp = o_comp_n. o_comp_n = working_list->get_next( ). TRY. o_comp->set_with_subcomp( abap_false ). _comp = o_comp->get_key( ). o_conn = o_comp->connector( ).
* Extract Component o_raw = o_conn->read_from_sap( o_comp ). TRY. CLEAR o_cnx_clean. o_cnx_clean ?= o_conn. o_cnx_clean->anonymize( o_raw ). CATCH cx_root. ENDTRY. o_raw->set_checksum( ). s_my_file-o_raw = o_raw. lmac_create_data o_data s_my_file. o_comp->set_add_object( o_data ). o_comp->set_checksum( o_data->checksum ). o_comp->set_code_signature( o_data->signature ).
CATCH zaplink_cx_connector INTO _cx_cnx. o_comp->set_exception( _cx_cnx ). TRY. o_comp->set_msg_coll( o_conn->application_log ). CATCH cx_root. ENDTRY. CATCH zaplink_cx_component INTO _cx_comp. CREATE OBJECT _cx_cnx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_failed prev_cx = _cx_comp. _cx_cnx->update( ). o_comp->set_exception( _cx_cnx ). * Failed to add component '&NAME&' (&TYPE&). Look at exception & message collector in component to get the root cause. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx_container EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_container=>add_comp_failed type = _comp-type name = _comp-name. ENDTRY. ENDWHILE.
CATCH zaplink_cx_list INTO _cx_list. * Failed to components list. Due to exception '&CX_NAME&'. CREATE OBJECT o_mycx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_component=>invalid_exception prev_cx = _cx_list. o_mycx->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_mycx. ENDTRY.
* Searching in file repository
CONCATENATE '*' ext_sep file_ext INTO d_mask. CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>filetypes-local ). t_filelist = o_file->search( mask = d_mask root_dir = target_dir ). DELETE t_filelist WHERE kind <> zaplink_file=>filedirkinds-file.
d_t_count = LINES( t_filelist ). * looking for file to import LOOP AT t_filelist ASSIGNING <f>.
IF sy-batch = abap_true. * Processing File : &1 MESSAGE i012 WITH <f>-name. ELSE. * Processing object : &2 (&1) MESSAGE i012 WITH <f>-name INTO msg. IF d_t_count > 0. _pos = 100 * sy-tabix / d_t_count. ELSE. _pos = sy-tabix. ENDIF. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = _pos text = msg. ENDIF.
s_my_file = load_file( <f>-name ). CHECK s_my_file-o_raw_base IS BOUND. lmac_create_data o_data s_my_file. CHECK o_data->type IN type AND o_data->name IN name. Check s_my_file-o_raw_base->directory-devclass IN packages. CREATE OBJECT o_comp. o_comp->set_add_object( o_data ). o_comp->set_type( o_data->type ). o_comp->set_name( o_data->name ). o_comp->set_checksum( o_data->checksum ). o_comp->set_devclass( s_my_file-o_raw_base->directory-devclass ). o_comp->set_src_sys( s_my_file-o_raw_base->directory-srcsystem ).
s_key = o_data->get_key( ). s_data = zaplink_directory=>get_directory( s_key ). o_srch_c = working_list->search( o_comp ). IF NOT o_srch_c IS BOUND. " update data or list working_list->add( o_comp ). " component do not exists in list ELSE. o_comp = o_srch_c. o_data_tmp ?= o_srch_c->get_add_object( ). IF NOT o_data_tmp IS BOUND. o_comp->set_add_object( o_data ). o_comp->set_action( actions-uninstall ). ELSE. o_data_tmp->join( o_data ). o_data = o_data_tmp. ENDIF. ENDIF. IF s_data-checksum = s_my_file-checksum. " File and last loaded are the same IF NOT o_srch_c IS BOUND. " however component do not exists within SAP : deletion handled manualy o_comp->set_action( actions-unreplicable ). ELSEIF s_data-checksum = o_srch_c->get_checksum( ). " No change at all o_comp->set_action( actions-none ). ELSE. " Default action is allready export ENDIF. ELSE. " File different than last load IF NOT o_srch_c IS BOUND. " New component in SAP o_comp->set_action( actions-import ). ELSEIF s_data-checksum = o_srch_c->get_checksum( ). " not change within SAP o_comp->set_action( actions-import ). o_comp->set_checksum( s_my_file-checksum ). o_comp->set_devclass( o_data->o_raw_base->directory-devclass ). o_comp->set_src_sys( o_data->o_raw_base->directory-srcsystem ). ELSEIF s_my_file-checksum = o_srch_c->get_checksum( ). " file and SAP are identical => Update DB o_data->checksum = s_my_file-checksum. o_data->signature = o_comp->get_code_signature( ). s_data-change = o_data->get_sap_data( ). zaplink_directory=>set_directory( key = s_key data = s_data-change ). o_comp->set_action( actions-none ). ELSE. * Replication conflict o_comp->set_action( actions-unreplicable ). ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDLOOP.
working_list->select_by_action( ).
